column4: any ideas why the Qtparted app on the "systemrescueCd" would only allow someone to partition their primary HDD and not a 2ndary one?
do you perhaps have to start it with an hdb argument, like with 'fdisk hdb' ?
good idea, i'm a fairly new-to-linux user trying to help out a friend who's trying it for the first time
i don't know definititely, just a suggestion
thanks
i've done so, via something or other i read on ubuntuguide
ok I'll keep looking then thanks (=
should be simple to find there, though i don't recall specifics
so you can hear the music here? http://www.morrisseymusic.com/quicktime/1.html
say my name again?
i don't hear it, but i think i have no sound now :/
lol well you don't see the jigsaw piece suggesting a missing plugin (= right?
it does fire up mplayer though, which says* it is playing rtsp://(long thing here).mov
right, it seems my sound is borked, since i dind't here xchat tell me you said my nick either
all indications are that i'd hear it there, if sound worked ... i'll ... gasp, reboot now
there is a lockfile you can rm under your old profile, under ~/.mozilla/firefox/
ahh thanks that makes sense... because of thecrash the lockfile says the profile's still in use right?
quit ff and compare the two dirs, the filename should be obvious, i don't recall it offhand
exactly
great
that bit me here a while back also
